examples: The purple flowers in the vase were beautiful.
My mom planted beautiful flowers in the front yard.
It's beautiful!
The train traveled through beautiful countryside.
The vibrant purple color of whinberries adds a beautiful touch to desserts like cheesecakes and tarts.
words.defineEn: describing weather that is pleasant, enjoyable, or favorable, often characterized by clear skies, mild temperatures, and calm conditions
words.defineVi: mô tả thời tiết dễ chịu, thú vị hoặc thuận lợi, thường được đặc trưng bởi bầu trời quang đãng, nhiệt độ ôn hòa và điều kiện bình tĩnh

examples: The days passed slowly.
The day brings a sense of vitality and liveliness to the world.
The news really made my day.
The hotel provides fresh towels for the guests every day.
Our car has seen better days!
words.defineEn: a period of time that is made up of twenty-four hours
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian được tạo thành từ hai mươi bốn giờ

examples: The water feels warm.
Are you warm enough?
It's quite warm outside.
The afternoon sun casts a warm glow on the buildings and trees.
The season of summer brings warm weather and longer days.
words.defineEn: having a temperature that is high but not hot, especially in a way that is enjoyable and pleasant
words.defineVi: có nhiệt độ cao nhưng không nóng, đặc biệt là theo cách thú vị và dễ chịu

examples: Spring came late this year.
Her latest novel takes the lid off the international art world.
The government's latest proposals are a dog's dinner.
She was only five minutes late!
The latest smartphone is now on the market.
words.defineEn: doing or happening not at the time that is usual or expected, but after it
words.defineVi: làm hoặc xảy ra không phải vào thời điểm thông thường hoặc dự kiến, nhưng sau đó

examples: Don't worry.
They worried about an FBI fishing expedition.
Don’t worry.
Don't worry about it.
Don't worry about him.
words.defineEn: to feel upset and nervous because we think about bad things that might happen to us or our problems
words.defineVi: cảm thấy khó chịu và lo lắng vì chúng tôi nghĩ về những điều tồi tệ có thể xảy ra với chúng tôi hoặc các vấn đề của chúng tôi

examples: The support of our families has helped enormously.
Helping you?
Such helps were like drop in the ocean.
The taxi driver helped me with my luggage.
His help is useful as a chocolate teapot.
words.defineEn: to give someone what they need or to make doing something easier or possible for them
words.defineVi: để cung cấp cho ai đó những gì họ cần hoặc để làm điều gì đó dễ dàng hơn hoặc có thể cho họ

examples: I recently sold my bike.
We ride our bikes along the bike lane on the main street.
I spotted a beautiful vintage motorcycle at the bike show.
She's had her eye on a bike for some time.
They had to listen to the usual yada yada about bike safety.
words.defineEn: a vehicle that has two wheels and moves when we push its pedals with our feet
words.defineVi: một chiếc xe có hai bánh và di chuyển khi chúng ta dùng chân đẩy bàn đạp của nó

examples: My son reads twelve pages of his book every day.
My sister's son is my beloved nephew.
His son doesn't share his passion for athletics.
Your son is in high school already?
My son is coming home soon.
words.defineEn: a person's male child
words.defineVi: con trai của một người

words.defineEn: to leave the house to go somewhere, usually to do something enjoyable
words.defineVi: rời khỏi nhà để đi đâu đó, thường là để làm điều gì đó thú vị

examples: The children drank their juice from colorful plastic glasses.
My parents always drink orange juice for breakfast.
Get a drink for John.
I usually drink a cup of green tea in the afternoon.
My brother always drinks smoothie after exercising.
words.defineEn: any liquid that we can drink
words.defineVi: bất kỳ chất lỏng nào chúng ta có thể uống

examples: The students worked their heart and soul on their project.
Not working my foot.
Soymilk works well as a substitute for milk in sauces and creamy pasta dishes.
My dad works forty hours a week.
To work clay.
words.defineEn: something that we do regularly to earn money
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó mà chúng tôi làm thường xuyên để kiếm tiền

examples: Does this pub do lunches?
He and his fellow workers would incessantly talk shop in the village pub.
He was in the pub drowning his sorrows after the break-up of his relationship.
After the row in a pub he drove off in a huff.
There were a couple of drunkards having a go outside our local pub last night.
words.defineEn: a place where alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks, and often food, are served
words.defineVi: một nơi phục vụ đồ uống có cồn và không cồn, và thường là thức ăn

words.defineEn: to take a quick or brief glance at something, usually with the purpose of getting an idea of what it is or what it looks like
words.defineVi: lướt qua một cái gì đó một cách nhanh chóng hoặc ngắn gọn, thường là với mục đích để có được một ý tưởng về nó là gì hoặc nó trông như thế nào

examples: Will you get the phone?
Your phone is ringing for the thousandth time.
The phone rang and broke my train of thought.
I have my phone to thank for my lack of sleep last night.
The phone lead isn’t long enough to reach the bedroom.
words.defineEn: an electronic device used to talk to a person who is at a different location
words.defineVi: một thiết bị điện tử được sử dụng để nói chuyện với một người đang ở một địa điểm khác

words.defineEn: a cafe or bar where one can buy non-alcoholic drinks and light snacks
words.defineVi: một quán cà phê hoặc quán bar nơi người ta có thể mua đồ uống không cồn và đồ ăn nhẹ

examples: His partner left the table in a fit of pique.
The spicy beef jerky left a smoky aftertaste in my mouth.
Red wine leaves a stain.
Leaves change colour in autumn.
The intense gaze from across the room, eyes on stalks, left no doubt about his attraction.
words.defineEn: to stop living, working, or being a part of a particular place or group
words.defineVi: ngừng sống, làm việc hoặc là một phần của một địa điểm hoặc nhóm cụ thể

examples: The price includes dinner, bed, and breakfast.
After dinner comes the reckoning.
The bell sounded for dinner.
The government's latest proposals are a dog's dinner.
Dinner is served between 7 and 10 p.m.
words.defineEn: the main meal of the day, eaten either in the middle of the day or in the evening
words.defineVi: bữa ăn chính trong ngày, ăn vào giữa ngày hoặc vào buổi tối

examples: The security expert warned the business owner that a bad padlock invites a picklock.
The water was so inviting that I couldn't resist taking a dip in the sea.
The farmer proudly displayed a plump fowl at the market, inviting customers to savor its flavorful meat.
To some extent such insistent emphasis hammers the argument home, rather than inviting the reader to engage with it.
I was tickled pink to be invited.
words.defineEn: a written or spoken request to attend an event, join an activity, or participate in a gathering
words.defineVi: một yêu cầu bằng văn bản hoặc lời nói để tham dự một sự kiện, tham gia một hoạt động hoặc tham gia vào một cuộc tụ họp

examples: The old couple took pity on him and gave him food.
For pity's sake, help me!
I took pity on the stray cat and fed him.
We took pity on a couple of people waiting in the rain for a bus and gave them a lift.
The woman's heart was filled with pity for the orphaned children, and as she spent time with them, she realized that pity is akin to love, and she became devoted to them.
words.defineEn: a feeling of sadness caused by the suffering of others
words.defineVi: một cảm giác buồn bã gây ra bởi sự đau khổ của người khác

examples: Things like this take time.
Time is moving on.
The time passed quickly.
Time to bust a move.
The contractor is really taking their time.
words.defineEn: the quantity that is measured in seconds, minutes, hours, etc. using a device like clock
words.defineVi: số lượng được đo bằng giây, phút, giờ, v.v. bằng thiết bị như đồng hồ

examples: Expecting eight guests all told.
Expect these changes to happen soon.
The company's new product launch is expected to do well in the market.
The novel was expected to sell between 1 000 and 1 500 copies.
Thousands of firms are expected to go to the wall this year.
words.defineEn: to think or believe that it is possible for something to happen or for someone to do something
words.defineVi: suy nghĩ hoặc tin rằng điều gì đó có thể xảy ra hoặc ai đó có thể làm điều gì đó

examples: The baby had chubby cheeks and a cute face.
The baby cried its head off.
The baby has brought them great joy.
The mother gently cradled her newborn baby in her arms.
The lioness carefully groomed her newborn baby.
words.defineEn: a child who is very young, usually too young to walk or speak
words.defineVi: một đứa trẻ còn rất nhỏ, thường còn quá nhỏ để đi hoặc nói

examples: Danish Blue cheese is fantastic in vegetarian dishes.
The vibrant hue of damson makes it a fantastic ingredient for homemade fruit popsicles.
Take time by the forelock and accept that fantastic internship!
She told me that yeast extract is a fantastic seasoning substitute for reducing sodium in my meals.
All my friends agree that Gruyère is a fantastic melting cheese.
words.defineEn: extremely amazing and great
words.defineVi: cực kỳ tuyệt vời và tuyệt vời

examples: The news really made my day.
These dogs seldom make the news.
The news spread like wildfire.
News of interest cuts came in the nick of time for borrowers.
The news came hot on the heels of another plane crash.
words.defineEn: reports on recent events that are broadcast or published
words.defineVi: báo cáo về các sự kiện gần đây được phát sóng hoặc xuất bản

examples: Congratulations, Rhett, you get to hug Zach Braff!
Where am I? - Congratulations.
I almost bid against myself twice. - Congratulations, Link. -
- Congratulations, I was running a secret investigation to smoke out the rat in this unit, and you just blew my cover.
And we're gonna sign that thing and send you a GMM poster and mug! - Congratulations! - (laughs) Woohoo!
words.defineEn: an expression of joy or approval offered to someone to acknowledge their achievement, success, or good fortune
words.defineVi: một biểu hiện của niềm vui hoặc sự chấp thuận dành cho ai đó để thừa nhận thành tích, thành công hoặc may mắn của họ

examples: I see you later, bye!
Bye. Say bye.
Bye. Say bye.
Have a good one, bye.
Have a good one, bye.
words.defineEn: a word we say when we are leaving someone or when they are leaving, or at the end of a phone call
words.defineVi: một từ chúng tôi nói khi chúng tôi rời khỏi ai đó hoặc khi họ rời đi, hoặc khi kết thúc cuộc gọi điện thoại

examples: The food looks good.
Good wine can make a meal.
Bad luck often brings good luck.
This information is as good as gold.
"Your guess is as good as mine."
words.defineEn: having a standard or quality that is satisfying
words.defineVi: có tiêu chuẩn hoặc chất lượng thỏa mãn

examples: The journey home through the storm was absolute murder!
The journey to the airport takes about half an hour.
They had to continue their journey on foot.
The ticket for the bus is valid for a single journey.
The adventurer used the tail fat as a survival resource during their journey in the wilderness.
words.defineEn: the act of travelling between two or more places, especially when there is a long distance between them
words.defineVi: hành động di chuyển giữa hai hoặc nhiều nơi, đặc biệt là khi có khoảng cách xa giữa chúng

words.defineEn: a small unspecified number of things or people
words.defineVi: một số lượng nhỏ không xác định của những điều hoặc người
